first_para: Valerie Carol Marian Vaz (born 7 December 1954) is a British politician and lawyer. A member of the Labour Party, she has served as the Member of Parliament (MP) for Walsall South since the 2010 general election.

full.extract: Valerie Carol Marian Vaz (born 7 December 1954) is a British politician and lawyer. A member of the Labour Party, she has served as the Member of Parliament (MP) for Walsall South since the 2010 general election.
full.title: Valerie Vaz
